TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionStateItemCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type ISessionStateItemCollection = interface interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 会话状态使用的集合定义协定，以管理会话。

span.span: Defines the contract for the collection used by ASP.NET session state to manage session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义的会话项向应用程序代码公开集合类。The interface defines the collection of session items exposed to application code by the class. ASP.NET 实现接口是类。The ASP.NET implementation of the interface is the class. 如果创建派生自的类类来存储会话数据，您可以使用类来管理存储的对象或实现上自己的集合管理器的接口。If you create a class derived from the class to store session data, you can either use the class to manage the stored objects or implement the interface on your own collection manager. 如果你实现接口，您还必须创建继承的类类以使利用你实现来管理会话变量。If you implement the interface, you must also create a class that inherits the class in order to make use of your implementation to manage session variables. 实现还必须实现的成员接口。An implementation must also implement the members of the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现，并使用类来存储会话状态变量名称和值。The following code example implements the and uses the class to store session-state variable names and values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection/CS/isessionstateitemcollectionsnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection/VB/isessionstateitemcollectionsnippets.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由来确定是否在值实现已修改。The property is used by the to determine whether the values in an implementation have been modified. 在实现接口，则应初始化属性作为`false`并设置属性设置为`true`的实现中， ，或方法。In implementing the interface, you should initialize the property as `false` and set the property to `true` in the implementations of the , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现属性。The following code example shows an implementation of the property. 有关完全实现的示例接口，请参阅为提供的示例接口概述。For an example of a complete implementation of the interface, see the example provided for the interface overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实现方法，应设置属性设置为`true`indicatevalues 中到实现已修改。In implementing the method, you should set the property to `true` to indicatevalues in the implementation have been modified. 如果实现不包含具有指定的元素`name`，集合会保持不变，并且没有异常引发。If the implementation does not contain an element with the specified `name`, the collection should remain unchanged and no exception be thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 方法的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the method. 有关完全实现的示例接口，请参阅中提供的示例接口概述。For an example of a complete implementation of the interface, see the example provided in the interface overview.
